official-title.#text:
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to make
		  publicly available on the official Medicare Internet site Medicare payment
		  rates for frequently reimbursed hospital inpatient procedures, hospital
		  outpatient procedures, and physicians’ services.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

, for

			 consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the
			 committee concerned
